name: Viper's Grudge
text:
Non-Reptile monsters you control cannot attack, also you cannot activate their effects.
You can only use each of the following effects of "Viper's Grudge" once per turn.
If a face-up Reptile monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Reptile monster from your Deck.
If this card is destroyed in the Spell & Trap Zone: You can return all your banished Reptile monsters to your GY.
